messages: Meet me at Zero's
The Disciple keeps its own time
Dusk does not know who you are
Auryn and his agents are on to us
Dusk settles with shifting time
Find your Testament
Tor, Da, Tu, Ka, La, Ver
Your power will return
Death won't deter you
What is the number between 12 and 13?
Mr. Fingers thinks differently now
Auryn knows too much
Do you remember your house?
Pale is a realm of spirits
You will find your heart again
Your secret soul is hidden
Grey is the shadow of Indigo
Dusk will recognize the token
Your thoughtforms are still here
The Hendassa are a bit pushy
We need you to return to Indigo
We need you back in Satyrine
There will never be magic in Grey
You will leave Grey and return home
The Black Cube will bring you back
Changeries await to reshape you
You are children of Visla
Come back to Indigo
The Path is a map of the soul
What secrets are hidden in your house?
A legion grows
You are still connected to the noosphere
There is a code at the end of the book
Monsters are sometimes helpful
Make sure you stop by the Lost Page
The 100 Rooms Hotel is down to 70 rooms
Goetics should visit the Two Handed Store
Listen to Teldar at The Orchard
Pale shades have a message for you
Sorry is no mere child
archivedMessages: Keep the Icon of Dusk with you, always
Time in Shadow is a pale shade
Dream Ash is more trouble than its worth
Why else would you reach out from Grey
There are friends in the dusk
Auryn has thoughtforms tracking you down
Dusk brings a great many things
Reach deep and find your qualia
You have souls and magic is possible
Chaos spreads in the absence of a Warden
You have a house waiting in Fartown
Truth seeps into Grey in Strange ways
Gold is not the end just a beginning
Some messages seem to sneak through
We have sent a demon but time is wrong
The demon will help you eventually
Cast the spell to free the Messenger
Unparalled Views upon Lu Ac Toor
Uptown Venues of Satyrine are temporary
The Invisible Sun shares its secrets

messageMonitor.successMessage: That is much better. Give us some time, we need to see what Auryn did to the Messenger.

messages.text: I see what you're doing. You should stop.
Stop. You don't know what you're doing.
If you rememebered what the War was, you wouldn't want to come back.
Book M is gone. Book M won't fix anything.
You're life is worth living, even if it isn't real.
Please, just stop following Z. She's going to get you killed.
There's nothing out there for you.
Forget everything you've seen. It will fade eventually.
Demiurge will find you if you keep this up.
You won't like it when Demiurge comes for you.
I'm trying to help you, but if you refuse there isn't much I can do.
Zendia and Rodir are blind to what the consequences are.

oneTimeMessages.message: My time in Grey wasn't awful.
I used to wake up, wondering where I was
I worked on cars. I was good.
I came back to Indigo with a wrench.
I still use it, even here.
And now I dream of shadows.
